snippet: Using the new Highlight app in San Francisco revealed some odd results. Almost a quarter of the people it highlighted in a particular area were chief executives or founders of start-ups. How could that be?
abstract: Using the new Highlight app in San Francisco revealed some odd results. Almost a quarter of the people it highlighted in a particular area were chief executives or founders of start-ups. How could that be?

headline.main: On Highlight, Everyone Is a C.E.O.
